verses.name: 2 Corinthians 10:5
verses.text: Casting down imaginations, and every high thing that exalteth itself against the knowledge of God, and bringing into captivity every thought to the obedience of Christ;

verses.name: 2 Corinthians 10:6
verses.text: And having in a readiness to revenge all disobedience, when your obedience is fulfilled.

verses.name: 2 Corinthians 10:7
verses.text: Do ye look on things after the outward appearance? If any man trust to himself that he is Christ’s, let him of himself think this again, that, as he is Christ’s, even so are we Christ’s.
